Articles.Content: I've posted this as a mod suggestion in the general add on affairs, but I think this should be heard here too. Think about all the hundreds of crafts you have. Searching through them for a single one is a pain. If we had folders or little tags for craft files, we could have craft file organization. People who play ksp a lot will understand me. I think this is a hidden idea that would make the game a little better an enjoyable.
I'm definitely keen on improved craft file organization with subfolders as well.

I support this

Currently I have to add stupid prefix to group my ships

Yes yes yes yes yes.

And add some sorting options while you're at it;'KerbalX has the right idea.
Tag and craft searching ! Thumbs up vote here.

Tag and craft searching ! Thumbs up vote here.

Tag would be cool! Just like the map view category thing, group my saves into lander/station/orbiter/etc.

That will feels much better than just a list of file names!

This need to be in the next update.

+1
Good to see that I'm not the only one who needs this.
Yes, absolutely needed. Also, the load and save screens need to show more craft. There's no reason for each one to take up ~50px of vertical screen space.
